scripts.wasm: cd ../rust-rsa && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --features wasm --no-default-features && wasm-bindgen --target nodejs target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/signature_gen.wasm --out-dir ../contracts/web && wasm-bindgen --target web target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/signature_gen.wasm --out-dir ../client/wasm
